title: Modernization of the services of the Department of Meteorology under the Climate Resilience Multi-Phase Programmatic Approach (CResMPA)
decision_details: - The Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock, Land and Irrigation is implementing the Climate Resilience Multi-Phase Programmatic Approach with financial support from the World Bank.  Modernizing the weather and climate-related services of the Department of Meteorology to reduce climate-related disaster risks through accurate early warnings and to support national development has been identified as a priority task under Component 1 of the first phase of the project. Accordingly, Expressions of Interest have been invited following the World Bank Procurement Guidelines to select a consultancy firm to carry out the modernization of the services of the Department of Meteorology. 08 institutions have submitted Expressions of Interest for this purpose. The Cabinet approved the proposal made by the Minister of Agriculture, Livestock, Land and Irrigation to award the relevant consultancy services contract, to the Asian Disaster Preparedness Centre in Bangkok, Thailand, based on the recommendation of the Cabinet Appointed Consultancy Procurement Committee.
